definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Dow Jones plans to create an index for the 2010 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯公司還計劃爲2010年冬季奧運會設立指數。

sentences.english: I mean, we are 500 points on the Dow- Jones industrial average .
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，我們在討論道瓊斯工業均指的500點。

sentences.english: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA 11,063, -31.79, -0.29%)  closed slightly lower on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯工業平均指數週五收盤時小幅走低。

sentences.english: All 30 stocks in the Dow Jones industrial average fell. The index closed down 279.65 points, or 2.22 percent, at 12,290.14.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯工業平均指數的30只股票全線下跌。

sentences.english: The index was about 10300 at the time.
sentences.chinese: 當時道瓊斯指數位於10300點左右。

sentences.english: A transcript of the documents, assembled by congressional investigators and reviewed by Dow Jones Newswires, indicates Mr.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯通訊社看過國會調查人員整理的文件副本。

sentences.english: However we do have a key resistance level at 8527 which may hold the Dow down.
sentences.chinese: 但市場有關鍵的阻力位置8527，會令道瓊斯下跌。

sentences.english: The DJIA was 60% higher than it is now.
sentences.chinese: 那時道瓊斯工業指數比現在高出60%。

sentences.english: The Dow Jones Industrial Average dipped more than 7 percent Thursday as panic sell-off dominated markets.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯工業指數週四跌幅超過7%，引發恐慌性拋售。

sentences.english: The Dow Jones industrial average rose nearly 112 points.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯工業平均指數上漲近112點。

sentences.english: The Dow Jones Company began publishing the Dow Jones Industrial Average in eighteen-ninety-six.
sentences.chinese: 在1896年，道瓊斯公司開始出版道瓊斯工業指數。

sentences.english: The Dow Jones Company began publishing the Dow Jones Industrial Average in eighteen-ninety-six.
sentences.chinese: 在1896年，道瓊斯公司開始出版道瓊斯工業指數。

sentences.english: Eastern time on the day the Dow was shedding nearly 778 points in a ragged panic.
sentences.chinese: 當天道瓊斯指數在恐慌性拋盤中暴跌了將近778點。

sentences.english: Yet the Dow rose from 66 to 11,497.
sentences.chinese: 然而道瓊斯指數從66點漲到了11497。

sentences.english: News Corp. owns Dow Jones & Co. and The Wall Street Journal.
sentences.chinese: 新聞集團擁有道瓊斯公司和《華爾街日報》。

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Dian4 wang3 Gong1 si1
